main_definition: The toe is the digit at the end of a human or animal foot, usually one of five in number.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A part of the foot that extends beyond the metatarsals (the long bones in the middle of the foot).
meanings_and_examples.example: The cat accidentally stepped on my toes while chasing a mouse.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In baseball, when a player hits the ball and it lands outside the boundaries set by the foul poles.
meanings_and_examples.example: He managed to toe-the-line home run, clearing all foul lines.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A slang term used in UK English referring to a person who is easily led or influenced.
meanings_and_examples.example: Don't let him be the one to steer your decisions; he's just a toe!
